attention to details
Details Perfected, Аrt in Every Coin.

«Welcome to the world of unicue collectible coins! Here, details are perfected, and art is infused into every coin.

Our mission is to relentlessly strive for new horizons and conquer peaks of excellence. Inspired by this pursuit, wecraft unique
coins, each of which is an unparalleled work of art. Just like ascending to mountaintops, our creativeprocess demands
determination, patience, and expertise. We invite you to explore the world of coins through oureyes and share in the joy of
discovering new horizons with us.

Explore our treasure trove of collections and be inspired by the extraordinary creations.»

ABOUT US

Two individuals with extensive experience have come together, combining their
knowledge andtalent, to become the premier producer of collectible coins. Thus,
«T&S Coin» was founded in 2023.

Our motto:
«Attention to detail leads to perfection, and perfection is not a mere detail.»

Tikhonovskiy Yuriy

Co-founder and co-owner
ART LEAD

Co-founder and co-owner ART LEAD

Allow us to introduce Yuri Tikhonovsky, one of the co-founders ofour company and a talented artist. Yuri is our Art Leader and ChiefEngraver, responsible for independently designing each collectiblecoin and creating the corresponding 3D models.

With years of experience in the field of coin creation, Yuri hasachieved unparalleled artistry and craftsmanship in engraving. Hebrings his creative inspiration and deep understanding of art toeach of his creations, making our coins truly unique.

Evaldas Stralkus

Co-founder and co-owner
HEAD OF PROJECTS

Evaldas met with coin's business in 2019 when becamedirector for Lithuanian Mint. The company specializes inproduction of circulation and collectible coins. He spentcountless hours researching different types of coins,studying their origins, and immersing himself in the coin'smarket all over the world. His passion led him to be close ofnumismatics, with a vast knowledge of various coinagesystems, mints, and coin grading.

He has strong leadership and successful track records indifferent businesses, demonstrating high standards ofvalues in his professional career. He believes that mostimportant is to make customers happy, as satisfactionleads to strong brand loyalty and enhancing the company'simage.
